channel.title: Comments on: Poor Man’s Shepherd’s Pie
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: ok here's a quick chinese carry-out substitution. take your arthur treacher's or long john silver's chicken and cut it into peices. throw some orange sauce condiment on top and serve it over rice. 5 minutes.
item.content:encoded: ok here’s a quick chinese carry-out substitution. take your arthur treacher’s or long john silver’s chicken and cut it into peices. throw some orange sauce condiment on top and serve it over rice. 5 minutes.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: you don't mean you pay someone else to make your mashed potatoes and chicken? next you'll tell me you make pasta salad using the box mix or just pick it up at the deli. i don't even know you, man :)
item.content:encoded: you don’t mean you pay someone else to make your mashed potatoes and chicken? next you’ll tell me you make pasta salad using the box mix or just pick it up at the deli. i don’t even know you, man ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Please, I *invented* mashed potatoes. Besides, instant mashed potatoes would add too much time to the shepherd's pie recipe.
item.content:encoded: Please, I *invented* mashed potatoes. Besides, instant mashed potatoes would add too much time to the shepherd’s pie recipe.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: mine feeds 5, and instant mashed potatoes are a disgrace to humanity. try the old fashioned way of cleaning the potatoes peeling the potatoes and cutting them and boiling them. then you get to smush them up real good with milk and butter. i also forgot to add flour garlic and onion to the dumplin recipe. for maximum impact, grow your own veggies. they don't perish as quickly in the garden. ask your landlord before you start :) but i will give you credit for being so inventive.
item.content:encoded: mine feeds 5, and instant mashed potatoes are a disgrace to humanity. try the old fashioned way of cleaning the potatoes peeling the potatoes and cutting them and boiling them. then you get to smush them up real good with milk and butter. i also forgot to add flour garlic and onion to the dumplin recipe. for maximum impact, grow your own veggies. they don’t perish as quickly in the garden. ask your landlord before you start ðŸ™‚ but i will give you credit for being so inventive.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Ha! My recipe has only three ingredients and takes about 5 minutes to make.
item.content:encoded: Ha! My recipe has only three ingredients and takes about 5 minutes to make.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description:
chicken n dumplins
chicken broth celery carrots potatoes chicken basil oregeno salt black pepper bisquik milk
boil everything but the bisquik and milk. follow the dumplin directions on the bisquik box for mixing the bisquik and milk. spoon on the batter, 10 min covered, 10 mnutes uncovered. eat.
it takes a little longer but totally worth it.
item.content:encoded:
chicken n dumplins

chicken broth
celery
carrots
potatoes
chicken
basil
oregeno
salt
black pepper
bisquik
milk

boil everything but the bisquik and milk. follow the dumplin directions on the bisquik box for mixing the bisquik and milk. spoon on the batter, 10 min covered, 10 mnutes uncovered. eat.

it takes a little longer but totally worth it.
